stories.title: Off Limits - Episode 1
stories.storyDescription: Jacey is wildly attracted to Ty. But there’s a big problem: seeing him could mean losing her best friend.
stories.creator: web-uploader

author.bio: Brandi Reeds is the critically acclaimed author of YA novels Oblivion and Splinter, written as Sasha Dawn. Her debut novel for adults, Trespassing, will be available in February.

stories.postPaywallNotification: Oh no, he didn’t. DID HE? Keep reading OFF LIMITS.
